title: When the automatic fire alarm operates, the respective air handling units of the air-conditioning system shall automatically be switched off
clause_text: When the automatic fire alarm operates, the respective air handling units of the air-conditioning system shall automatically be switched off. The air filters of the air-handling units shall be of non-combustible materials. The air handling unit room shall not be used for storage of any combustible materials.

source_pdf.text_snippet: When the automatic fire alarm operates, the respective air handling units of the air-conditioning system shall automatically be switched off.
